critique: The executive order appears to be a routine reassignment of military personnel. There is no indication of an attempt to evoke any particular emotion in the audience. Therefore, all emotion scores should be low. The initial scores are all set to 1, indicating a minimal level of each emotion. After further consideration, it seems even a score of 1 is too high, as the order is purely administrative and unlikely to evoke any emotional response. Therefore, the revised scores are all set to 0.
